product_desc:
We have developed an Artificial Intelligence Engine that uses Speech Recognition to deliver language lessons as if you were talking to a real human teacher.

There are 1.2 billion people learning a foreign language in the world. Some 800 million want to learn English.

In Asia English teaching apps account for $1 Billion in revenue, with the top three countries being China, Korea and Japan

Current technology language solutions schedule a student with a teacher online or via Skype for a video conference. The disadvantages to this method is scalability and quality of teachers.

Over the past 12 months we have developed a purely software driven alternative, a multi-lingual Artificial Intelligence Engine that uses Speech Recognition and TTS (Text-to-Speech), to create a similar experience as if it was a real human teacher.

Our software driven approach is scalable and delivers consistent quality teaching at a fraction of the cost of competitors offerings.
name: TWAIN
